code: import axios from"axios";const REST_API_ROOT_URL='http://localhost:8080';const REST_API_PRODUCT_DIR=REST_API_ROOT_URL+"/products";const REST_API_SEARCH_DIR=REST_API_ROOT_URL+"/search";export async function getProducts(){let page=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:0;let pageSize=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:2;return await axios.get("".concat(REST_API_PRODUCT_DIR,"?page=").concat(page,"&pageSize=").concat(pageSize));}export async function prepopulate(){return await axios.get("".concat(REST_API_ROOT_URL,"/config?action=prepopulate"));}export async function getProduct(id){return await axios.get("".concat(REST_API_PRODUCT_DIR,"/").concat(id));}export async function addProduct(product){return await axios.post(REST_API_PRODUCT_DIR,product);}export async function udpateProduct(product){return await axios.post(REST_API_PRODUCT_DIR,product);}export async function searchProducts(name){return await axios.get("".concat(REST_API_SEARCH_DIR,"/").concat(name));}
